categories: Category:Victory I-class Star Destroyers of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: Vagrant was a Victory I-class Star Destroyer of the Imperial Starfleet. Along with two Carrack-class light cruisers, the Nexus and the Xerxes, the Vagrant attempted to stop the Defiance Task Force from rendezvousing with the Rebel fleet at Sullust. They were held back by A-wings, two of which were piloted by Olin Garn and Ace Azzameen.
